title: Kuo: iPhone 14 Pro camera bump to be even larger thanks to new 48MP sensor
content:
Last September, one of the first iPhone 14 leaks claimed that the iPhone 14 would be the first iPhone model in years not to feature a camera bump of any kind. More recent leaks, however, have contradicted that claim, with the latest contradiction coming from Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.

moreâ€¦

The post Kuo: iPhone 14 Pro camera bump to be even larger thanks to new 48MP sensor appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is doubling down on the camera bump with the iPhone 14 design. The camera bump will reportedly get even bigger thanks to a new sensor..
